documentation.text:
@dev Base contract for Pool factories.
 Pools are deployed from factories to allow third parties to reason about them. Unknown Pools may have arbitrary
 logic: being able to assert that a Pool's behavior follows certain rules (those imposed by the contracts created by
 the factory) is very powerful.
@dev Returns true if `pool` was created by this factory.

@dev Registers a new created pool.
 Emits a `PoolCreated` event.

 Pools are deployed from factories to allow third parties to reason about them. Unknown Pools may have arbitrary
 logic: being able to assert that a Pool's behavior follows certain rules (those imposed by the contracts created by
 the factory) is very powerful.
@dev Returns true if `pool` was created by this factory.

@dev Registers a new created pool.
 Emits a `PoolCreated` event.

devdoc.details: Base contract for Pool factories. Pools are deployed from factories to allow third parties to reason about them. Unknown Pools may have arbitrary logic: being able to assert that a Pool's behavior follows certain rules (those imposed by the contracts created by the factory) is very powerful.

isPoolFromFactory(address).details: Returns true if `pool` was created by this factory.
